title: League only runs when i run as admin
body: every time i try to run without running as admin i get a bugsplat error

replies.body: You might have a security setting with your OS or some software that's blocking your game files from being accessible.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  Hope that gets you back into game without anymore of those pesky errors.
